title: Gather Requirements for MultiModalSummarizer
description: Collect and document comprehensive requirements for the MultiModalSummarizer tool. This includes supported content types (text, video, audio), desired output formats (plain text, summarized text with media previews, etc.), user experience expectations (ease of use, customization options, etc.), performance requirements (processing speed, memory usage, response time, compatibility with popular mobile and desktop platforms and browsers), security considerations (data protection, authentication, encryption), accessibility considerations (support for screen readers, keyboard navigation, ARIA labels), internationalization considerations (language support, localization), and any additional specifications or constraints that may impact the development process. Also, outline the data sources, APIs, or libraries to be used for extracting and summarizing content. Upon completion, create a detailed requirements document. Additionally, include an initial wireframe sketch of the user interface design.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for content ingestion, AI summarization, and output generation.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Content Ingestion
description: Develop the components for ingesting and preprocessing various content types (text, video, audio).

title: Integrate AI Summarization
description: Integrate AI models and libraries for summarizing different content types.

title: Develop Output Generation
description: Implement components for generating and formatting summaries in a unified output format.

title: Create User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the MultiModalSummarizer tool.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the application follows best practices for security, including input validation, access control, and data protection.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the MultiModalSummarizer tool, including user guides, API references, and developer documentation.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute thorough testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
